products.title: Lenovo G50-30 (Notebook) (Pentium Quad Core/ 2GB/ 500GB/ Win8.1) (80G001Y2IN)
products.description:
Important Features of Lenovo G50-30 (Notebook) (Pentium Quad Core/ 2GB/ 500GB/ Win8.1) (80G001Y2IN)

  • Pentium Quad Core (4th Gen)
  • 2 GB DDR3 RAM
  • 500 GB HDD
  • Windows 8.1

Lenovo G50-30 Notebook

Carry this sleek and stylish notebook from Lenovo wherever you go so you can finish any important work, play games, and watch a movie on-the-go. It comes with a 2.16 GHz PQC processor and 2 GB DDR3 RAM which will change the way you work.

Display

  • 39.6 cm (15.6)
  • GPU

The 39.6 cm (15.6) HD WLED eDP display of this notebook brings images and videos to life with its crisp and vivid colors. The Intel HD graphics processor adds vibrancy to images.

Performance

  • Processor
  • Turbo Boost
  • 2 GB DDR3 RAM
  • Up to 8 GB

This notebook has 4th Gen PQC processor which clocks at 2.16 GHz for a smooth performance. It also delivers turbo boost of up to 2.66 GHz for applications which require more power. The 2 GB DDR3 RAM, expandable up to 8 GB, lets you multitask between applications quickly.

Operating System

  • Windows 8.1

This notebook is pre-installed with Windows 8.1 operating system.

Storage

  • 500 GB HDD

Store and access files easily from this notebook as it has a 500 GB storage capacity.

Multimedia

  • 1.5 W Speakers
  • HDMI

Watch a DVD movie from the 9.0 mm SuperMulti DVD Tray-in Drive and hear clear audio from the dual 1.5-Watt speakers. This notebook allows you to display contents from the notebook on to your TV using the HDMI port.

Connectivity

  • Wi-Fi
  • 0.3 MP Webcam
  • Bluetooth v4.0
  • 3 USB Ports

Stay connected to the Web and also video chat with friends as this notebook has Wi-Fi capabilities and has 0.3 MP webcam. Now you can quickly transfer files from compatible devices as this notebook supports Bluetooth v4.0 and comes with three USB ports - a USB 3.0 ports and two USB 2.0 ports.

Power

  • 4 Cell Battery

This notebook draws power from a 45-Watt adapter. Charge the four cell battery of this notebook and enjoy up to four hours of backup.

products.title: Lenovo G50-80 80E5038NIN Core i3 (5th Gen) - (4 GB DDR3/500 GB HDD/Windows 10) Notebook
products.description:
Important Features of Lenovo G50-80 80E5038NIN Core i3 (5th Gen) - (4 GB DDR3/500 GB HDD/Windows 10) Notebook

  • Core i3 (5th Gen)
  • 4 GB DDR3 RAM
  • 500 GB HDD

Lenovo G50-80 Notebook

Work on a presentation that you need to deliver in your office or school on this powerful Lenovo G50-80 Notebook. It also has an HDMI port which lets you project it on the big screen for added impact.

Display

  • 39.62 cm (15.6)

Rich and crystal-clear pictures can be viewed on the 39.62 cm (15.6) HD TN GL flat display. It has a resolution of 1366 x 768 pixels which makes viewing any content on the screen a treat for the eyes.

Performance

  • 2 GHz Processor
  • 4 GB DDR3 RAM
  • Up to 16 GB
  • GPU

This notebook comes with an inbuilt 4 GB DDR3 RAM which is expandable up to 16 GB, so you can seamlessly multitask between apps. This notebook has an Intel Core i3 (5th Gen) processor, with a clock speed of 2 GHz, which makes browsing the Web or playing online games an easy task. The Intel HD graphics adds vibrancy to images.

Operating System

  • Windows 10 OS

This notebook runs on Windows 10 OS which makes navigation easy even for beginners. The Windows store has a wide range of apps to choose from.

Sound

  • Dual 1.5 W Speakers

Hear the beats clearly when you watch a music video on this notebook. Take entertainment to the next level with the dual 1.5 W stereo speakers.

Connectivity

  • 0.3 MP Webcam
  • Built-in Mic
  • HDMI Port
  • 3 USB Ports
  • Wi-Fi

Take out the DVDs from the attic and watch a movie over the weekend as this notebook has a SuperMulti DVD tray-in drive. The 0.3 MP webcam, Wi-Fi, and internal microphone makes video chatting fun. Transfer files quickly into this notebook from USB pen drives as it comes with a USB 3.0 port and two USB 2.0 ports. It also has an HDMI port.

Storage

  • 500 GB HDD

With a storage capacity of 500 GB, you can store music albums, movies, and even work files.

Power

  • 4 Cell Battery

This notebook is powered by a 4-cell battery that offers a backup of up to four hours.

products.title: Acer Aspire E11 ES1-111 NX.MRKSI.004 Celeron Dual Core - (2 GB DDR3/500 GB HDD/Linux) Netbook
products.description:
Important Features of Acer Aspire E11 ES1-111 NX.MRKSI.004 Celeron Dual Core - (2 GB DDR3/500 GB HDD/Linux) Netbook

Key Features of Acer Aspire E11 ES1-111 NX.MRKSI.004 Celeron Dual Core - (2 GB DDR3/500 GB HDD/Linux) Netbook

  • Celeron Dual Core
  • 2 GB DDR3 RAM
  • 500 GB HDD

Acer Aspire E11 ES1-111 Netbook

The Acer Aspire E 11 is a light and compact netbook that features a smart FlowCurve design and a powerful Celeron dual-core processor making it perfect for every day use. You can use this netbook for long hours without it getting heated up as it's designed to not require a cooling fan.

Design

  • 29.46 cm (11.6)
  • LED Backlit
  • Silent Operation

This netbook not only has a unique Flow Curve design but also has a large precision touchpad that is optimised for accuracy and sensitivity. Weighing a mere 1.29 kg, this netbook has a 29.46 cm (11.6) screen with an HD LED Backlit ultra slim TFT LCD display with ComfyView feature to give you a clarity like no other.

Performance

  • Celeron Dual-Core
  • Intel HD Graphics
  • 2 GB DDR3 RAM
  • 8 GB Expandable
  • Up To 2.58 GHz

You can use this netbook while on the go as it's compact and light. Apart from being portable, it helps you multitask with ease, thanks to its Celeron dual-core processor that has a clock speed of 2.16 GHz with Turbo Boost up to 2.58 GHz. For fast processing and improved performance, this netbook comes with Intel HD Graphics, 2 GB DDR3 RAM that can be expanded to 8 GB.

Operating System

  • Linux

This netbook has a Linux-based operating system that comes with built-in firewall and virus protection software, and all essential applications and games.

Connectivity

  • Ethernet Port
  • Two USB Ports
  • Crystal Eye HD
  • Stereo Speakers
  • Built-in Mic
  • SD Card Reader
  • HDMI

The ethernet port in this netbook supports gigabit LAN so you can enjoy a smooth web browsing session as well as fast downloads. Store or retrieve media files using two USB ports and an SD card reader. This netbook is Skype certified and meets the audio-visual standards with a Crystal Eye HD webcam along with built-in stereo speakers and a microphone. Now you can watch your favourite videos on a larger screen, thanks to the HDMI port with HDCP v1.3 support.

Other Features

  • Up To 5 Hours
  • Bluetooth v4.0

This notebook comes with a 3 cell battery backup of up to 5 hours so you can work without any hassles once you've charged it. It's Wi-Fi-enabled and supports b,g and n bands. This notebook features Bluetooth v4.0 that helps share files wirelessly and comes with a Kensington Lock Slot for enhanced security.

Storage

  • 500 GB HDD

Save or store applications, presentations, documents and media in this laptop without worrying about space limitation as it has a 500 GB hard drive.

products.title: HP 15-ac039TU Notebook (Celeron Dual Core/ 4GB/ 500GB/ Free DOS) (M9U93PA)
products.description:
Important Features of HP 15-ac039TU Notebook (Celeron Dual Core/ 4GB/ 500GB/ Free DOS) (M9U93PA)

  • Celeron Dual Core
  • 4 GB DDR3 RAM
  • 500 GB HDD

HP 15-ac039TU Notebook

Experience seamless Internet browsing and multitasking with this powerful HP Notebook. It comes with a Celeron Dual Core processor and 4 GB RAM to meet everyday computing requirements.

Performance

  • 1.6 GHz Celeron
  • 2.16 GHz Turbo Boost
  • 4 GB RAM
  • Up to 8 GB
  • GPU

This notebook has a Celeron Dual Core processor that offers a smooth performance. It clocks at 1.6 GHz and can turbo boost up to 2.16 GHz for heavy applications. Multitask efficiently with the 4 GB RAM that can also be expanded up to 8 GB. The Intel HD Graphics processor adds vibrancy to images.

Display

  • 39.6 cm (15.6)
  • LED Backlit

Play games or browse the Web on this notebook's 39.6 cm (15.6) HD BrightView widescreen display. The LED-backlit display has a resolution of 1366 x 768 pixels.

Multimedia

  • DTS Sound+ Speakers
  • HD Webcam

You can groove to rich and clear audio of your favorite music album while cooking or relaxing after a tiring day through the DTS Sound+ dual speakers of this notebook. The TrueVision HD webcam is handy for video calls or selfies.

Storage

  • 500 GB HDD

With 500 GB of storage space, this notebook offers ample space to store your favourite multimedia files and important documents.

Connectivity

  • Wi-Fi
  • Bluetooth v4.0
  • 3 USB Ports
  • HDMI Port

This device offers a wide range of connectivity options - Wi-Fi, Bluetooth v4.0, two USB 2.0 ports, a USB 3.0 port, and an HDMI port. You can now access the Internet, transfer content and connect to other compatible devices.

Operating System

  • DOS OS

This notebook has DOS operating system pre-installed. Select the operating system of your choice - Windows, Ubuntu, or Linux - to upgrade this system's capabilities.

Battery

  • 4 Cell Battery

This notebook is powered by a 4-cell battery that can be charged via a 65 W AC adapter.

products.title: Swipe Ultimate 3G (Intel 2-in-1 Detachable Laptop) (Atom Baytrail Quad Core/ 2GB/ 32GB ROM/ Win10)
products.description:
Important Features of Swipe Ultimate 3G (Intel 2-in-1 Detachable Laptop) (Atom Baytrail Quad Core/ 2GB/ 32GB ROM/ Win10)

  • Intel Atom Baytrail Quad Core
  • 2 GB DDR3 RAM
  • 32 GB ROM HDD
  • Windows 10

Swipe Ultimate 3G 2-in-1 Laptop

With the number of hybrid devices rising in the market, mobile computing is taking a new turn. The latest addition is the Swipe Ultimate 3G 2-in-1 Laptop which delivers impressively and comes at a reasonable cost.

Operating System

  • 8.1 With Bing

Preloaded with genuine Windows 10, this Swipe 2-in-1 device brings you the productivity of a laptop and the fun of a tablet. Enjoy the friendly user interface of Windows and get access to a wide variety of Windows apps.

Performance

  • 1.83 GHz
  • 2 GB RAM

The Swipe Ultimate comes with an Intel Atom Bay Trail quad-core processor that clocks at 1.83 GHz and 2 GB of RAM. Whether you are surfing the net, playing games or checking important mail, this tablet performs smoothly and lag-free.

Display

  • 25.65 cms
  • Technology

This hybrid device has a 25.65 cms (10.1) IPS display with a resolution of 1280 x 800 pixels. View your favourite photos and videos in crisp HD quality on this device.

Storage

  • 32 GB ROM
  • 64 GB Expandable

With an internal flash storage of 32 GB and expandable storage up to 64 GB, your Swipe Ultimate makes the perfect storehouse for your favourite photos, videos, documents and music.

Camera

  • 5 MP Rear
  • 2 MP Front

This versatile device comes with two cameras. The 5 MP rear camera lets you capture great pictures while the 2 MP front camera is ideal for selfies and video chats.

Connectivity

  • Support
  • Wi-Fi

Not able to find a Wi-Fi hotspot when in need? This portable device comes with a 3G enabled SIM slot, so you can connect to the internet anywhere. Besides, you can also connect to Wi-Fi when it is available.
